description: This file defines an abstraction for a notes repository and its local SQLite implementation. It includes an abstract class 'NotesRepository' with method signatures for CRUD operations on notes, and a concrete class 'LocalNotesRepository' that implements these methods by interacting with a 'NotesDatabase' instance.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Abstract class for notes repository supporting multiple storage backends, with methods to load, create, save, and remove notes.

classes.name: LocalNotesRepository
classes.description: Concrete implementation of NotesRepository using a local SQLite database, encapsulating CRUD operations.

methods.name: loadAll
methods.description: Loads all notes sorted by last updated timestamp.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note and returns the created note with its id.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id.
